notifications.title: New Version 1.0.9.0 - Program Enhancements
notifications.message: Update adds ability to reorder Instructions in the Notes & Instructions form of Formulations & Soap Formulations.  Open the Microsoft Store to Update to latest version now!

notifications.title: We Welcome Feeback
notifications.message: Program feedback and feature requests can be sent through the Submit Ticket link in the Knowledge Base or throught the Email in the Help/About tab!
